description:
The Power Stretch Pro Jacket is a mid-weight Polartec® fleece hoody designed to be worn as either a standalone piece or as part of a layering system in cold environments.

Polartec Powerstretch Pro is a high performance layer, with a low friction outer surface to increase abrasion and weather resistance, and the ability to retain warmth whilst remaining dry and comfortable.The soft and stretchy Powerstretch Pro is a much sought after asset in the alpine layering system and means that movement is unhindered as you make your way to the summit.

All in all this is one of Rab's more technical fleece options that can withstand the elements as an outer layer or even be worn directly next to the skin if you are really looking to optimise your layering system.
name: Rab Power Stretch Pro Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Fabric Outer - Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro
